mapper.select: SELECT collection.id, collection.book_id, collection.create_time, book.book_name, book.price, book.book_num, book.book_pictures, book.logic_delete_flag FROM collection JOIN book ON collection.book_id = book.id where collection.user_id = #{collection.userId} and collection.logic_delete_flag = 0 GROUP BY collection.book_id,collection.id
